snippet: The Indian presidency has been largely ceremonial, until now. The current presidential race, to be decided on July 19 if neither candidate bows out, suggests how much Indian politics has changed.
abstract: The Indian presidency has been largely ceremonial, until now. The current presidential race, to be decided on July 19 if neither candidate bows out, suggests how much Indian politics has changed.

headline.main: Which is Better for India: Rubber Stamp or Partisan President?
